articles.title: No-Cook Budget Meals for When You're Too Tired to Cook (or Don't Have a Stove): 7 Lifesaving Recipes Under $3 Each
articles.author: Maria Santos
articles.description: Whether it's heat, laziness, or no kitchen â€” this is your fix. After 3 months with a broken stove and a $50/week food budget, here are 7 no-cook meals that saved my sanity and wallet.
